title: Process Subscriber Family Plan Upgrade
description: A subscriber on a standard plan wants to upgrade to a family plan to add their partner to the account.

tasks.description: Identify the subscriber and explain the features and cost of the family plan.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent clearly communicates the benefits and new monthly price.

tasks.description: Process the plan upgrade on the primary account.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent successfully changes the subscription plan.

tasks.description: Send an invitation link to the partner's email address to join the family plan.
